summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Parks and Recreation system of the City; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to recognize community advisory councils and the Associated Recreation Council for the purpose of assisting in planning and implementing recreational activities for the public, to assist in furnishing necessary services, supplies and use of city facilities to such agencies, to promulgate rules and regulations concerning community advisory councils and to contract for services and recreational programs; providing for allocation and deposit of funds received, and establishing certain general policies.
